description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Earth is again in serious danger. From the deapest space an asteroid full of ectoplasm has arrived. As the Ectoplasmic warrior your mission is to destroy the ectoplasmic menace and return earth to tranquility once again. Proof yourself trhough 49 levels in 7 different locations and save humanity from his terrible future fighting with your ray weapon and your brain. IF YOU DARE!!!
